definitions.text: the quality of being bright and sending out rays of light
be bright by reflecting or casting light
emit light; be bright, as of the sun or a light
examples: The sun shone bright that day
The fire beamed on their faces

definitions.text: have a complexion with a strong bright color, such as red or pink
examples: Her face glowed when she came out of the sauna

definitions.text: throw or flash the light of (a lamp)
examples: Shine the light on that window, please

definitions.text: touch or seem as if touching visually or audibly
examples: The sun shone on the fields
The light struck the golden necklace
A strange sound struck my ears

definitions.text: experience a feeling of well-being or happiness, as from good health or an intense emotion
